[[module CSS]]
/* HEADER AREA */
 :root {
	--header-title: "RAISA Archive";
	--header-subtitle: "RECORDS AND INFORMATION SECURITY ADMINISTRATION";
	--titleColor: hsl(0, 0%, 20%);
	--subtitleColor: hsl(0, 0%, 20%);
	--lgurl: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4031/raisa-logo100.png);
}

 div#container-wrap {
	background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4031/raisa-body_bg.png);
}

 #header::before {
	opacity: .4;
}

 #login-status,
 #login-status a,
 #login-status #my-account {
	color: hsl(0, 0%, 20%);
}

 #account-topbutton {
	border-color: hsl(0, 0%, 20%);
}

 #page-title {
	display: none;
}

/* FORMATTING */
 #page-content .collapsible-block {
	box-shadow: none;
}

 .title-style {
	text-underline-offset: 30%;
}

 .centered-table {
	display: flex;

	border-collapse: collapse;
}

 .centered-table > tbody {
	margin: auto;
}

 .centered-table td {
	padding: .4rem .8rem;

	border: thin solid hsl(0, 0%, 5%);

	text-align: center;
}

 .centered-table tr:first-child td {
	width: 30%;

	background: silver;

	font-weight: bold;
}

 .sanguine {
	color: hsl(356, 82%, 38%);

	font-weight: bold;
}
[[/module]]

SCP-4031

++++ NOTICE FROM THE FOUNDATION RECORDS AND INFORMATION SECURITY ADMINISTRATION
----
The following file was discovered in a dilapidated experimentation chamber in the Site-82 Research Wing.

-- Alexis Rose, Digitization Department Lead
[[/div]]

[[div class="material-box"]]
[[=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/theme:classic/scp_foundation_logo.png style="height: 75px; width: 75px"]]
[[div class="scp-header"]]
**__Anomalous Item Entry__**
[[/div]]
[[div class="scp-info"]]
[[div]]
__**Item #:**__ SCP-4031
[[/div]]
[[div]]
__**Object Class:**__ Euclid
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="material-box"]]
[[div class="title-style"]]
= Special Containment Procedures
[[/div]]

= [[size large]][[span class="terminal-span"]]N/A[[/span]][[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="material-box"]]
[[div class="title-style"]]
= Description
[[/div]]

SCP-4031 is a powerful, fast-acting amnesiac of unknown makeup, quantity, and origin.

Subjects in visual, olfactory, gustatory, auditory, tactile, and memetic range sustain short-term memory loss, disassociation, and an acidic aftertaste. Application of the amnesiac leads to a male vocalization of human origin. Exposed subjects cannot corroborate the vocalization's existence during interrogation.
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="addenda-header"]]
+++ Attached Addenda
[[/div]]
[[div class="material-box"]]
[[div class="title-style"]]
= I. Experimentation Log
[[/div]]

The following is a series of alleged interactions with SCP-4031. Interactions were not logged in real time; unknown subject(s) recorded the interactions in documentation areas. Inputs include different persons, objects, and conceptual structures. Results include various levels of conceptual recall.

[[/div]]

[[div class="material-box"]]
[[div class="title-style"]]
= II. Investigative Report
[[/div]]

An investigatory team took Class-W Mnestic[[span class="fnnum"]].[[/span]][[span class="fncon"]]**Mnestic:** An agent used to temporarily enhance a user's immediate memory retention.[[/span]] drugs with the intent to examine SCP-4031. The team discovered a hitherto unaccounted-for male subject on the floor, deceased. The subject suffered lacerations, emaciation, a broken left clavicle, and blood loss in the oral cavity.

Moreover, the subject suffered [[[a-kind-of-redemption|extensive trauma to the head.]]]
[[/div]]
